findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%.

findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet.

findings.title: MC - Missing Check
findings.description: The contract is processing variables that have not properly sanitized and checked.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow theSolidity naming convention.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract, and make the code's size bigger.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause lose of prediction.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Variables that are defined in the local scope containing the same name from an upper scope.

findings.title: Abusable Admin Functions
findings.description: The contract owner can abuse admin functions to stop transactions, manipulate fees, and transfer funds to the team's wallet.
